name: d4guide-deploy
description: Welcome to the **Scarmonit Gaming Hub**, a comprehensive platform for Diablo 4 build guides, gaming tools, file sharing, and community resources. This project is hosted on **Cloudflare Pages** and leverages **Cloudflare R2** for secure and scalable file storage.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run api" "npx wrangler pages dev _site"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy _site --project-name=d4guide
